---
order: 3
message_1: Keep 
link: calm
message_2: and carry on. 
---

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <title></title>

    <script type="text/javascript">

    function submit()
    {
        var keepcalmtext = document.getElementById("keepcalm_").value;
        var andtext = document.getElementById("and_").value;
        var carryontext = document.getElementById("carryon_").value;
        var colortext = document.getElementById("color_").value;
        document.getElementById("kc").innerHTML = keepcalmtext;
        document.getElementById("and").innerHTML = andtext;
        document.getElementById("co").innerHTML = carryontext;
        document.getElementById("page").style.backgroundColor = colortext;
    }

    function hide()
    {
        document.getElementById("gui").style.display = "none";
    }
    </script>

    <style type="text/css">

    body{

    }
    #gui{
        margin: 30px;
        padding: 10px;
        border: 1px solid #444;
        border-radius: 3px;
    }

    #page{
        border: 1px solid #efefef;
        margin: 0px;
        background-color: #F9001A;
        width: 560px;
        padding: 60px;
        padding-bottom: 100px;
    }

    #crown{
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
        background-size: 200px 200px;
        width: 200px;
        height: 200px;
        margin: 0px auto 20px auto;

        background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml;base64,");
    }

    p{
        text-transform: uppercase;
        color: #ffffff;
        font-family: 'Gill Sans','Gill Sans MT';
        font-size: 96px;
        text-align: center;
        margin: 0px;
        margin-bottom: 20px;
    }

    #and{
        font-size: 52px;
    }

    </style>
</head>
<body>
<div id="gui">
    
<textarea id="keepcalm_">Keep<br/>calm</textarea>
<textarea id="and_">and</textarea>
<textarea id="carryon_">carry<br/>on</textarea>
<textarea id="color_">#F9001A</textarea>
<button onclick="submit()">Submit</button>
<button onclick="hide()">remove for printing</button>

</div>


    <div id="page">
        <br />
        <div id="crown"></div>
        <p id="kc"></p>
        <p id="and"></p>
        <p id="co"></p>
    </div>

</body>
